name: gramophone
title: Blackberry Gramophone Bluetooth Speaker
description: Meet the Blackberry Gramophone Speaker - the perfect balance of nostalgia and modernity. Enjoy the warm, rich sound of vinyl, now combined with the convenience of Bluetooth technology.

name: headphones
title: Blackberry Harmony Headphones
description:
Where Silence Meets Sound.
 Immerse yourself in crystal-clear audio with our cutting-edge active noise cancellation technology, ensuring an uninterrupted auditory experience in any environment. Stay connected to your surroundings with ambient noise control, striking the perfect balance between tranquility and awareness.

name: watch
title: Blackberry Smart Watch
description: an elegant fusion of technology, style, and convenience. With advanced fitness and health tracking and smart home integration, this watch is the ultimate wearable companion.

name: phone
title: Black Berry Phone I
description: Packed with innovative features, such as Photoshop built into the gallery app, for a seamless and creative experience. With its sleek design, high-resolution camera, and long-lasting battery life, this phone is perfect for capturing moments and getting things done.

name: keyboard
title: Blackberry Keyboard Pro
description: The ultimate typing experience with intuitive touch controls and elegant design. Type faster and more efficiently than ever before with the comfort of a physical keyboard paired with the flexibility of a touchscreen display.
features: RGB Backlit, Controlled by RGBerry software
